import { listen } from "ananse";

// const ussd = new Ananse().configure({
// 	gateway: __GATEWAY__,
// 	session: __SESSION__,
// });

__BUSINESS_LOGIN__;

const port = process.argv[2];
if (port == null) {
	throw new Error(
		"Port is required. Please provide a port number as argument to the script",
	);
}
listen(
	(req, res) => {
		console.log(`Server listening on port ${port}`);
		requestHandler(req, res);
	},
	parseInt(port),
	"localhost",
);
